name: viper shooter
description:
Viper  Shooter prototype.  Browser Only.   NOT a mobile version.

left click to shoot. 

W/A/S/D keys or the Wheel with the mouse to move the viper.

The fullscreen mode works best.

if you try to play via mobile you will not see the joystick at the bottom right or the play button at the top right of the screen. 

(I made a different version for mobile)
